# Chris McMillon - Cinematographer

> Seattle-based cinematographer and FAA-certified drone operator available for projects across the US and Asia.

## About

Chris McMillon is a director of photography and aerial cinematographer with over 8 years of experience working in Asia and the United States. He specializes in drone cinematography, FPV flying, and commercial/branded content.
